price: 70 C’est là une faveur insigne du Seigneur qui connaît suffisamment Ses serviteurs[281].
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
